column3: This file is updated (usually before releases) using `makeseeds.py`, see the documentation [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/contrib/seeds/README.md#seeds).\n\nWe wouldn't add single specific entries.
\nHello, sorry I want to contribute with a node and leave it fixed in the code, I will read the documentation to see how it is done, thanks
